```{r, include=FALSE}
library(lme4)
library(dplyr)

#hast  <- read.csv("V4.csv")
hast  <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/umontano/kar/master/hasta_nada_mas.csv")
```

## Interaction DM-Image  Boxplot

```{r boxplot, include=TRUE}
#pdf("~/u/boxplot.pdf")
# SVG graphics device
#svg("my_plot.svg")
# Code of the plot
pdf("boxplot_by_DM_cht.pdf")
boxplot(Tiempo ~  Imagen : MD   , data=hast)
dev.off()
```




## Results of Multivariate Regression with Interaction

```{r table1, echo=FALSE}
linear %>%
        tbl_regression(exponentiate = FALSE, intercept=FALSE)  %>%
        as_gt()  %>%
        tab_header("Coeffiecients for the Model Image and MD as predictors of RTs, with Interaction", subtitle = NULL)
```




## Regression Without Interaction

```{r}
linear <- glm(Tiempo ~  1 + Imagen : MD   , family = gaussian, data=hast)
summary(linear)

```

```{r}
resultsanova <- aov(Tiempo ~  1 + Imagen : MD   ,  data=hast)
summary(resultsanova)
TukeyHSD(resultsanova)

```






```{r}
mixed3 <- lmer(Tiempo ~  1 + MD : Imagen  + (1 | Nombre) + (1 | Edad) + (1 | Sexo) , family = gaussian, data=hast)
mixed2 <- lmer(Tiempo ~  1 + MD : Imagen  + (1 | Nombre) + (1 | Edad) , family = gaussian, data=hast)
mixed1 <- lmer(Tiempo ~  1 + MD : Imagen  + (1 | Nombre) , family = gaussian, data=hast)
mixed000 <- lmer(Tiempo ~  1 + MD : Imagen  + (1 | Nombre) + (1 | Edad) + (1 | Sexo) + (1 | Participante), family = gaussian, data=hast)
summary(mixed1)
```


```{r}
AIC(logLik(linear))
AIC(logLik(mixed1))
AIC(logLik(mixed2))
AIC(logLik(mixed3))
```

```{r}
anova(linear,  mixed1,  mixed2,  mixed3, test = "Chisq", refit = F)
```



```{r}
anova(mixed1,  mixed2,  mixed3, test = "Chisq", refit = F)
```


```{r}
anova(linear,  mixed1, test = "Chisq", refit = F)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)


pdf("boxplot_GG_by_DM.pdf")
ggplot(hast, aes(Imagen, Tiempo, fill=MD)) +
        geom_boxplot() +
        facet_wrap(~MD)
dev.off()


```



```{r}

pdf("/media/vv/1/boxplot_GG_by_IMAGE.pdf")
ggplot(hast, aes(MD, Tiempo, fill=MD)) +
        geom_violin() +
        facet_wrap(~Imagen, nrow = 1)
dev.off()


```
